Honoring those who watch over our souls - International Day of Pastors

# International Day of Pastors

:::tip[Important]
*The International Day of Pastors (JIP) is scheduled for **June 15-20, 2025** in Yaound, Cameroon.*

**Historic event** bringing together African spiritual leaders to honor their pastors and spiritual directors.
:::

## Honoring those who watch over our souls

A spiritual celebration bringing together pastors, bishops, apostles and Christian leaders from Africa to :

- **Honor** freely the pastoral ministry
- **Reflect** on spiritual impact in Africa
- **Connect** generations of spiritual leaders
- **Strengthen** the unity of the African Christ body

## Preliminary Program

| Day | Theme | Focus |
|-----|-------|--------|
| **Day 1** | Official Opening | Welcome & Worship |
| **Days 2-3** | Training & Workshops | Spiritual Equipment |
| **Days 4-6** | Mission & Celebration | Action & Gratitude |

:::note[Key Date]
**The event starts on June 15, 2025 at 00:01 (GMT+1)**

The official countdown will be displayed in real time on this site.
:::

## Our Vision

> "God has called us to honor those who watch over souls. This is not just an event, but a movement of unity and spiritual growth across Africa."  *Pastor Patrick*

## How to Participate

###  Physical Participation
- **Location**: Yaound, Cameroon
- **Duration**: 6 days (June 15-20, 2025)
- **Target Audience**: Pastors, bishops, African spiritual leaders

###  Virtual Participation
- **Live broadcast**: Accessible to all
- **Honor duties**: Distance participation
- **Community activities**: Locally synchronized events

## Call for Donations

:::danger[Urgent Need]
Organizing this historic event requires your spiritual and financial support for:

- **Logistical costs coverage**
- **Media production**
- **Participant accommodation**
- **Training material**

**Mobile Money** (Cameroon): Orange Money / MTN Money
:::

## Available Resources

Download our official documents for promotion:

Discover the story and vision of Pastor Patrick, founder of JIP

# Pastor Patrick - Founder of JIP

Pastor Patrick is the visionary man behind the International Day of Pastors. With over 20 years of experience in pastoral ministry, he deeply understands the challenges and joys of pastoral service.

## His Story

Pastor Patrick began his ministry in a small rural church in Cameroon. There, he realized the isolation that pastors can sometimes feel, especially in rural areas.

## His Vision

One day, while praying for his team of pastors, the vision of JIP was revealed to him: to create a special day to honor and encourage pastors all over the world.

> *"Honoring those who watch over our souls"*

This simple but powerful phrase has become the motto of JIP.

## His Impact

- Founder of 3 successful churches in Cameroon
- Mentor to over 100 pastors
- International speaker on pastoral leadership
- Author of several books on ministry

## His Mission

Pastor Patrick firmly believes that pastors deserve more recognition and support. That's why he has dedicated his life to creating JIP and building a worldwide community of united pastors.

Discover the vision of the International Day of Pastors

# Our Vision

The International Day of Pastors (JIP) was born from a clear and inspired vision: **honoring those who watch over our souls**.

## Our Mission

We firmly believe that pastors play a fundamental role in our communities. This special day is dedicated to them for:

-  **Recognizing their devotion** and daily sacrifice
-  **Providing continuous training** adapted to current challenges
-  **Creating a worldwide community** of supportive pastors
-  **Encouraging excellence** in pastoral ministry

## Our Values

- **Excellence**: We aim for quality in everything we do
- **Solidarity**: Together, we are stronger
- **Training**: Continuous learning is essential
- **Inspiration**: We want to rekindle the flame of ministry

## Our Impact

We aspire to transform the lives of pastors and, by extension, their communities through:

- Quality training sessions
- Authentic fellowship moments
- Practical ministry resources
- International support network

---

Discover the complete program of the International Day of Pastors

# JIP Program Schedule

The International Day of Pastors takes place over **6 intensive days** filled with training, fellowship, and inspiration.

##  Global Schedule

**Dates:** June 15-20, 2025
**Location:** Yaound, Cameroon
**Format:** In-person + Online

---

##  Day 1 - Monday June 15
### Opening & Vision

**09:00 AM - 10:30 AM** | Opening ceremony
- Welcome address by Pastor Patrick
- JIP vision presentation
- Participants meet & greet

**11:00 AM - 12:30 PM** | Inspirational session
- "The modern pastor's calling"
- Testimonials from experienced pastors

**02:00 PM - 05:00 PM** | First training session
- Pastoral leadership in 21st century Africa
- Workshops by working groups

---

##  Day 2 - Tuesday June 16
### Theological Training

**09:00 AM - 12:00 PM** | In-depth biblical training
- Hermeneutics and exegesis
- Effective preaching

**02:00 PM - 05:00 PM** | Church management
- Ecclesiastical administration
- Finances and development

---

##  Day 3 - Wednesday June 17
### Practical Workshops

**09:00 AM - 12:00 PM** | Choice workshops
- Advanced pastoral counseling
- Communication and media
- Social work and community

**02:00 PM - 05:00 PM** | Experience sharing
- Thematic round tables
- Pastor exchanges

---

##  Day 4 - Thursday June 18
### Mission & Evangelism

**09:00 AM - 12:00 PM** | Missionary strategies
- Urban evangelism
- International missions

**02:00 PM - 05:00 PM** | Social engagement
- Pastors and social justice
- Charitable action

---

##  Day 5 - Friday June 19
### Fellowship & Communion

**09:00 AM - 12:00 PM** | Fellowship time
- Informal meetings
- Sharing challenges and solutions

**02:00 PM - 05:00 PM** | Divine celebration
- Thanksgiving worship
- Honor ceremony

---

##  Day 6 - Saturday June 20
### Closure & Commitment

**09:00 AM - 11:00 AM** | Vision for the future
- Planning for the coming year
- Community commitment

**11:30 AM - 01:00 PM** | Closing ceremony
- Certificate presentation
- Official group photo

---

##  Practical Information

### Participation Modalities
- **In-person:** 100 participants maximum
- **Online:** Unlimited access
- **Certificate:** Delivered to all participants

### Provided Resources
- Participant manual (200+ pages)
- Access to recordings (6 months)
- Private JIP network (LinkedIn)

# Participation  la JIP

La Journe Internationale des Pasteurs est ouverte  tous les pasteurs, responsables d'glise et leaders communautaires qui souhaitent se former et s'inspirer.

##  Qui peut participer ?

- **Pasteurs** de toutes dnominations
- **Responsables d'glise** et dirigeants
- **Leaders communautaires** et ducateurs
- **tudiants en thologie** (dernire anne)
- **pouses de pasteurs** et partenaires ministry

##  Formulaire d'inscription

Pour vous inscrire, remplissez notre formulaire simple :

**Champs requis :**
- Nom complet
- Adresse email
- Numro de tlphone (optionnel)
- glise/Organisation (optionnel)
- Type de participation
- Message (optionnel)

##  Cots

### Participation Prsentielle
- **Frais d'inscription :** 25 000 FCFA
- **Comprend :** Formations, matriel, repas, certificat

### Participation en Ligne
- **Frais d'inscription :** Gratuit
- **Comprend :** Accs streams, ressources digitales

##  Logement (Prsentiel)

Pour les participants sur place, nous recommandons :
- **Htel Palace** (centre-ville) - 15 000 FCFA/nuit
- **Htel Meridien** (prs du lieu) - 20 000 FCFA/nuit
- **Maison d'htes** - 8 000 FCFA/nuit

##  Dates Importantes

- **Ouverture des inscriptions :** 1er Mars 2025
- **Clture des inscriptions :** 31 Mai 2025
- **Confirmation de participation :** 5 Juin 2025

##  Certificat

Tous les participants recevront un **certificat officiel** de participation  la JIP.

---

##  Planning Global

**Dates :** 15-20 Juin 2025
**Lieu :** Yaound, Cameroun
**Format :** Prsentiel + En ligne

---

### Ouverture & Vision

**09h00 - 10h30** | Crmonie d'ouverture
- Mot de bienvenue du Pasteur Patrick

- Rencontre des participants

**11h00 - 12h30** | Session inspirante
- "L'appel du Pasteur moderne"

**14h00 - 17h00** | Premire formation

**09h00 - 12h00** | Formation biblique approfondie

- Finances et dveloppement

---

- Conseils pastoraux avancs

**14h00 - 17h00** | Partage d'expriences
- Tables rondes par thmatiques
- changes entre pasteurs

---

##  Jour 4 - Jeudi 18 Juin
### Mission & vanglisation

**09h00 - 12h00** | Stratgies missionnaires
- vanglisation urbaine

**14h00 - 17h00** | Engagement social
- Pasteurs et justice sociale
- Action caritative

---

##  Jour 5 - Vendredi 19 Juin

- Culte de reconnaissance
- Crmonie d'honneur

##  Jour 6 - Samedi 20 Juin

**09h00 - 11h00** | Vision d'avenir

- Remise des certificats
- Photo de groupe officielle

# Notre Vision

La Journe Internationale des Pasteurs (JIP) est ne d'une vision claire et inspire : **honorer ceux qui veillent sur nos mes**.

## Notre Mission

Nous croyons fermement que les pasteurs jouent un rle fundamental dans nos communauts. Cette journe spciale leur est ddie pour :

-  **Reconnaitre leur dvouement** et leur sacrifice quotidien
-  **Fournir une formation continue** adapte aux dfis actuels
-  **Crer une communaut mondiale** de pasteurs solidaires
-  **Encourager l'excellence** dans le ministre pastoral

## Nos Valeurs

- **Excellence** : Nous visons la qualit dans tout ce que nous faisons
- **Solidarit** : Ensemble, nous sommes plus forts
- **Formation** : L'apprentissage continu est essentiel
- **Inspiration** : Nous voulons ranimer la flamme du ministre

## Notre Impact

Nous aspirons  transformer la vie des pasteurs et, par extension, celle de leurs communauts  travers :

- Des formations de qualit
- Des moments de fellowship authentique
- Des ressources pratiques pour le ministre
- Un rseau de soutien international

---

*"Honorer ceux qui veillent sur nos mes"* - C'est plus qu'un slogan, c'est notre engagement quotidien.

Pastor Patrick - Founder of JIP

Section titled Pastor Patrick - Founder of JIP

Pastor Patrick is the visionary man behind the International Day of Pastors. With over 20 years of experience in pastoral ministry, he deeply understands the challenges and joys of pastoral service.

His Story

Section titled His Story

Pastor Patrick began his ministry in a small rural church in Cameroon. There, he realized the isolation that pastors can sometimes feel, especially in rural areas.

His Vision

Section titled His Vision

One day, while praying for his team of pastors, the vision of JIP was revealed to him: to create a special day to honor and encourage pastors all over the world.

Honoring those who watch over our souls

This simple but powerful phrase has become the motto of JIP.

His Impact

Section titled His Impact
  • Founder of 3 successful churches in Cameroon
  • Mentor to over 100 pastors
  • International speaker on pastoral leadership
  • Author of several books on ministry

His Mission

Section titled His Mission

Pastor Patrick firmly believes that pastors deserve more recognition and support. Thats why he has dedicated his life to creating JIP and building a worldwide community of united pastors.

Notre Vision

Section intitule Notre Vision

La Journe Internationale des Pasteurs (JIP) est ne dune vision claire et inspire : honorer ceux qui veillent sur nos mes.

Notre Mission

Section intitule Notre Mission

Nous croyons fermement que les pasteurs jouent un rle fundamental dans nos communauts. Cette journe spciale leur est ddie pour :

  • Reconnaitre leur dvouement et leur sacrifice quotidien
  • Fournir une formation continue adapte aux dfis actuels
  • Crer une communaut mondiale de pasteurs solidaires
  • Encourager lexcellence dans le ministre pastoral

Nos Valeurs

Section intitule Nos Valeurs
  • Excellence : Nous visons la qualit dans tout ce que nous faisons
  • Solidarit : Ensemble, nous sommes plus forts
  • Formation : Lapprentissage continu est essentiel
  • Inspiration : Nous voulons ranimer la flamme du ministre

Notre Impact

Section intitule Notre Impact

Nous aspirons transformer la vie des pasteurs et, par extension, celle de leurs communauts travers :

  • Des formations de qualit
  • Des moments de fellowship authentique
  • Des ressources pratiques pour le ministre
  • Un rseau de soutien international

Honorer ceux qui veillent sur nos mes - Cest plus quun slogan, cest notre engagement quotidien.
Register for the International Day of Pastors

# Participation in JIP

The International Day of Pastors is open to all pastors, church leaders, and community leaders who wish to train and be inspired.

##  Who can participate?

- **Pastors** from all denominations
- **Church leaders** and administrators
- **Community leaders** and educators
- **Theology students** (final year)
- **Pastors' wives** and ministry partners

##  Registration form

To register, fill out our simple form:

**Required fields:**
- Full name
- Email address
- Phone number (optional)
- Church/Organization (optional)
- Type of participation
- Message (optional)

##  Costs

### In-Person Participation
- **Registration fees:** 25,000 FCFA
- **Includes:** Training, materials, meals, certificate

### Online Participation
- **Registration fees:** Free
- **Includes:** Stream access, digital resources

##  Accommodation (In-Person)

For on-site participants, we recommend:
- **Palace Hotel** (city center) - 15,000 FCFA/night
- **Meridien Hotel** (near venue) - 20,000 FCFA/night
- **Guest house** - 8,000 FCFA/night

##  Important Dates

- **Registration opens:** March 1, 2025
- **Registration closes:** May 31, 2025
- **Participation confirmation:** June 5, 2025

##  Certificate

All participants will receive an **official JIP participation certificate**.

Our Vision

Section titled Our Vision

The International Day of Pastors (JIP) was born from a clear and inspired vision: honoring those who watch over our souls.

Our Mission

Section titled Our Mission

We firmly believe that pastors play a fundamental role in our communities. This special day is dedicated to them for:

  • Recognizing their devotion and daily sacrifice
  • Providing continuous training adapted to current challenges
  • Creating a worldwide community of supportive pastors
  • Encouraging excellence in pastoral ministry

Our Values

Section titled Our Values
  • Excellence: We aim for quality in everything we do
  • Solidarity: Together, we are stronger
  • Training: Continuous learning is essential
  • Inspiration: We want to rekindle the flame of ministry

Our Impact

Section titled Our Impact

We aspire to transform the lives of pastors and, by extension, their communities through:

  • Quality training sessions
  • Authentic fellowship moments
  • Practical ministry resources
  • International support network

Honoring those who watch over our souls - This is more than a slogan, its our daily commitment.
